sourcesContent:
import React from "react"; function Features() { return ( <>
{/* Start of feature section ============================================= */}
{/*
Our awesome features

Our features will help to improve business

Sales teams use PandaDoc to improve deal workflow, insights, and speed while delivering an amazing buying experience. Get your documents out the door fast to keep deals.

Start a free trial
*/} {/* /feature left content */}

Step 1

You must have a local wallet like trustwallet, funded with atleast $10

{/* list item */}

Step 2

Sign up by using your sponsors referral link

{/* list item */}

Step 3

Login, purchase your first Level (Level 1) by sending $10 to Once your payment is approved you will start receiving matrix.

{/* list item */}

Step 4

Your First Income Your first 2 referral which you have directly invited or received from spillovers from your upline will purchase their first level from you. They will both send you $10 each making it a total income of $20 And you make your first moon trip entring into unlimited earnings

{/* list item */}

Step 5

The system will require you to purchase Level 2 the moment you have received payment equal to the amount of your next level upgrade. This is to ensure security, continuity and even distribution of payment among participants.

{/* list item */}

Step 6

Purchase Level 2 from your 2nd level upline by sending payment of $20 Your referrals on your 2nd line will purchase Level 2 through you, sending you a payment of $20,000 X 4 (No. of team members on your 2nd line within the matrix) giving you a total of $80

{/* list item */}

Step 7

After you have purchased Level 2, you can purchase LEVEL 3 by sending payment of $40 to your 3rd level upline. LEVEL 3 is considered a LEADERSHIP LEVEL. Participants on your 3rd line will purchase level 3 through you. You will receive donations from six (8) participants on your 3rd line. These members will directly send a payment of $40 each X 8 giving you a total of $320,

{/* list item */}
{/* End of feature section ============================================= */}
{/* Start of integration section ============================================= */}
Our awesome features

SaaSio use the tool you love

Say goodbye to manual data entry. Integrate with the tools you depend on so your team can get proposals, contracts and quotes out the door fast.

{/* End of integration section ============================================= */}
); } export default Features;
